title: Citrea Proposes First ZK Rollup to Make Bitcoin the All-Chain
description: Citrea, a project that aims to scale Bitcoin through ZK rollups, came out of stealth on Tuesday. The project aims to become a pathway for several initiatives to take advantage of the decentralization and security of Bitcoin while at the same time contributing to scaling and giving developers the ability to adapt Ethereum Virtual Machine […]

title: Can Etsy Preserve its Artisanal Charm Amidst Mainstream Ambitions?
description: In a significant departure from its artisanal origins, Etsy, the online marketplace renowned for handcrafted, vintage, and unique items, is making its debut on the grand stage of Super Bowl advertising. With its first-ever commercial during the event, Etsy is poised to introduce its evolving identity to a wider audience, showcasing a new feature called […]
